availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Shackelford (Madison County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk)

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, circuit court clerk. Born January 4,1812 in Madison County, Kentucky. Father of George J. Shackelford and Edward Shackelford. Married Melissa Walker Shackelford on December 15,1846. Father of Joel W. Shackelford. Appointed U.S. Postmaster of Richmond Courthouse, Kentucky, on 28 May 1841. Circuit court clerk in 1850. Circuit court clerk in 1860. Circuit court clerk in 1864. Died December 5, 1867.

ab.bibl:
Record of Appointment of Postmasters, 1832-1971, NARA Microfilm Publication, M841, Records of the Post Office Department, Record Group Number 28, Vol 12A, p. 471 of microfilm, (accessed via Ancestry.com on May 31, 2019).

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 501
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Madison County, Richmond, p. 8
